game.name: Snowball Fast
game.description:
Snowball Fast is a fun and beautifully-designed action game for Snowmen-loving boys and girls of all ages. Your aim is to fling the snowballs at as many snowmen crossing your path as possible. Make sure to shoot the maximum number of snowmen to help you survive long in the game. You have to apply your patience and quick reaction skills to achieve the goal of this mouse-clicking challenge. Play with open eyes and throw as many snowballs as you can at the wicked snowmen!

Remember the snowmen can also throw snowballs at you and all you need to be very quick to change your position when you see an icy snowball coming fast to you. In this free online shooting game, you can use your left click button of the mouse. Begin this game with clicking the big start button and get yourself ready to dive into a pool of ultimate thrill and fun! On the screen, you will see snowmen with different colour scarves in their neck, including yellow, green and red. 

Make to shoot all of them with the snowballs you have given to you. Try not to leave a single one. If you fail in hitting even a single snowman, you will lose your game immediately. Join this fun and skill-based game right away to take yourself into a world full of adventurous! Our free online game website also features many more games including death-defying tricks, thrilling soundtrack and realistic visuals. All the best, kids!
